meanings.definition: The state of having good digestion.

meanings.sent2: Her eupepsias improved after she started incorporating more fiber-rich foods into her diet.

meanings.sent5: The doctor was impressed by the patient's eupepsias, noting it as a sign of overall good health.

meanings.definition: The quality of being in good health and having a good appetite.
meanings.sent1: Despite his age, the elderly man's eupepsias allowed him to enjoy a hearty meal without any problems.
meanings.sent2: Her glowing skin and energetic demeanor were clear indicators of her eupepsias.
meanings.sent3: The dog's eupepsias was so remarkable that it could finish its food in seconds and still beg for more.

meanings.sent5: The eupepsias of the athlete was enviable, as he could eat anything without worrying about his health.
